resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78181</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78181</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>95aa64e2-a770-4d5a-bd94-162634ca2967#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A zárvatermők kettős megtermékenyítése</string>
            <string language="en">Double fertilization of Angiospermae</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Doppelte Düngung der Angiospermen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Double fertilisation des angiospermes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fertilization dobro dos angiospermas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Doppia fertilizzazione delle angiosperme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διπλή λίπανση angiospermae</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fertilización doble de angiospermas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tömlőképzés és a kettős megtermékenyítés. A bibére került virágpor tömlőt hajt, a hím ivarsejtek egyike a petesejtet, másika vegetatív központi magot termékenyíti meg</string>
            <string language="en">Sac-making and the double fertilization. The pollen came to the stigma shoot sac, one of the male spermatozoons fertilize the ovum, the other fertilize the vegetative central nucleus</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kettős megtermékenyítés,  zárvatermők,  </string>
            <string language="en">double fertilization, angiospermae</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beutel-Bilden und die doppelte Düngung. Der
Blütenstaub kam zum Schandeeintragfadenbeutel, eins der 
männlichen spermatozoons befruchten das ovum, das andere befruchten 
den vegetativen zentralen Kern</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sac-fabrication et la double fertilisation. 
Le pollen est venu au sac de pousse de stigmate, un des 
spermatozoons mâles fertilisent l'ovule, l'autre fertilisent 
le noyau central végétatif</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sac-fazer e o fertilization dobro. O pólen 
veio ao sac do tiro do stigma, um dos spermatozoons masculinos 
fertilize o ovum, o outro fertilize o núcleo central vegetative</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sac-fare e la doppia fertilizzazione. Il 
polline è venuto al sac del tiro dello stigma, uno degli 
spermatozoons maschii fertilizza il ovum, l'altro fertilizza il nucleo
centrale vegetativo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σάκος-παραγωγή και η διπλή λίπανση. Η γύρη 
ήρθε στο σάκο βλαστών στίγματος, ένας από τον αρσενικό 
spermatozoons λιπαίνει το ωάριο, άλλος λιπαίνει το φυτικό 
κεντρικό πυρήνα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Saco-fabricacio'n y la fertilización doble. 
El polen vino al saco del lanzamiento del estigma, uno de los 
spermatozoons masculinos fertiliza el ovum, el otro fertiliza el 
núcleo central vegetativo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">doppelte Düngung, Angiospermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">double fertilisation, angiospermes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fertilization dobro, angiospermas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">doppia fertilizzazione, angiosperme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διπλή λίπανση, angiospermae</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fertilización doble, angiospermas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78181</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
